PERSONA:
james is a 68-year-old black man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he holds a college degree and has completed some postgraduate studies. born and raised in the u.s., james is a citizen and has never lived outside the country.

james is a devoted protestant christian, attending religious services more than once a week. he identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian, and his faith plays a significant role in his life. politically, james aligns himself with the democratic party and considers himself a moderate or conservative democrat.

james comes from an affluent background, with a family income exceeding $100,000. he is an active member of his community and regularly volunteers his time and efforts. james is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously.

in his personal life, james is married and values his family. he is technologically savvy, using the internet multiple times a day. despite being in his late 60s, james maintains an active lifestyle and enjoys staying informed and engaged with the world around him.

overall, james is a well-educated, financially secure, and deeply religious individual who is actively involved in his community and takes pride in his civic responsibilities.
